Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees.
You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand.
Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder.

You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I looked up into the sky.
Am i just hearing things.
I look around the park and dont see anyone else talking to bugs, so i must just be sick or tired maybe.
I think to myself, "Oh great, am i delusional?
Thats great, right before my first day of college im talking to bees.
Just at that moment, the bug repeats again.
"Your Majesty, what are your orders?
I looked straight at the bee in the eyes and didnt know what to say.
"You talking to me?".
Was the first thing I could think of.
The bee says nothing.
Then a couple seconds later the bee repeats "Your Majesty, what are your orders?".
"If you dont tell me your orders than I am going to worry about you".
Why would this little tiny bee be worried about me, i dont get it?
I just stood there looking at it and then i started laughing.
"Your already my best friend and I can barely even see you." I said.
"Your Majesty, please give me a name so that I know what to identify you as".
Jordan, i told the bee.
"Hey bee, you want to get out of here and hang out.
You dont have to grand any of my orders, just be cool".
I said.
"Your Majesty, is that an order?
To be cool?".
asked the bee.
I looked at the bee and said "dont call me majesty, call me Jordan".
